semantics.label: translate:: 標語
translate:: Mode
semantics.description: translate:: Mode of presenting the dialog cards

semantics.label: 描述
translate:: 卡片

fields.label: translate:: 圖像
fields.description: translate:: 卡片上額外顯示的圖片（卡片可以只有文字或圖片，或兩個都有）

fields.label: translate:: 問題提示
fields.description: translate:: 在卡片正面顯示的提示文字

fields.label: translate:: 答案註解
fields.description: translate:: 在卡片背面顯示的註解文字

semantics.label: translate:: 行為設定
semantics.description: translate:: 透過設定來控制行為

fields.label: translate:: 啟用「重新開始」按鈕
translate:: 停用「返回」按鈕
fields.description: translate:: 在進行中禁止使用者回到上一張卡片。

fields.label: translate:: 依卡片調整字體尺寸
fields.description: translate:: 若不勾選，會改以文字內容來決定卡片尺寸。

fields.label: translate:: 隨機出卡
fields.description: translate:: 啟用後，卡片顯示的順序會隨機。

fields.label: translate:: Allow quick progression
fields.description: translate:: If activated, learners can decide to indicate that they know a card without turning it

semantics.label: translate:: 翻面按鈕文字
translate:: 下一張卡片按鈕文字
translate:: 上一張卡片按鈕文字
translate:: 重新開始按鈕文字
translate:: Text for the "correct answer" button
translate:: Text for the "incorrect answer" button
translate:: Text for "Round" message below cards and on the summary screen
semantics.description: translate:: @round will be replaced by the number of the current round

semantics.label: translate:: Text for "Cards left" message
semantics.description: translate:: @number will be replaced by the number of cards left in this round

semantics.label: translate:: Text for the "next round" button
semantics.description: translate:: @round will be replaced by the round number

semantics.label: translate:: Text for the "Start over" button
translate:: Text for the "show summary" button
translate:: Title text for the summary page
translate:: Text for "Cards you got right:"
translate:: Text for "Cards you got wrong:"
translate:: Text for "Cards not shown:"
semantics.default: translate:: Cards in pool not shown:

semantics.label: translate:: Text for "Overall Score"
translate:: Text for "Cards completed"
semantics.default: translate:: Cards you have completed learning:

semantics.label: translate:: Text for "Completed rounds:"
translate:: Message when all cards have been learned proficiently
semantics.description: translate:: @cards will be replaced by the number of all cards in the pool. @max will be replaced by the maximum proficiency level - 1.
semantics.default: translate:: Well done! You got all @cards cards correct @max times in a row!

semantics.label: translate:: 進度訊息文字
semantics.description: translate:: 可用的變數為 @card 與 @total。
semantics.default: translate:: 目前在第 @card 張，共 @total 張。

semantics.label: translate:: 卡片正面文本
semantics.description: translate:: 此設定為報讀器使用

semantics.label: translate:: 卡片反面文本
semantics.description: translate:: 此設定為報讀器使用

semantics.label: translate:: 顯示提示或註解按鈕
translate:: 音訊無法支援說明文字
semantics.default: translate:: 目前使用的瀏覽器不支援播放這個音訊。

semantics.label: translate:: Confirm starting over dialog

fields.label: translate:: Body text
fields.default: translate:: All progress will be lost. Are you sure you want to start over?
